Trigger You are dying

Frequency once per day

Effect Draw a harrow card, and you automatically lose the dying condition, though you remain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious] at 0 Hit Points. If the card you drew was from the suit of Shields, you awaken and have an amount of Hit Points restored to you equal to [[/r (1d6+@actor.level)[healing]]]{1d6 + your level}.
